title: Collaborative Font !
content:
hi! ,  
this is a request of collaboration for the creation of a collaborative font.

The font name's GRASSO and it is a stylish, big, glam, only-uppercase, font for headers, magazines and posters....

I developed the entire alphabet and 3 number but now i would like to collaborate with someone else to create a better font.

When the font will be complete I will release it under opensource license.

If you believe in typography, collaboration, sharing ideas and opensource write me an email to tonio[at]webelieveindesign.com and I could send the vector file to work on.  
(send me some example of your work)

here some example of the font I'm talking about...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120308180305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/492743679_3d36782a8a_3837.jpg)
  
the red one.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120308180305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/493472212_84afdd996c_4268.jpg)
author: alabamadez

comments.content: Antonio, I hope that someone with more bezier talent and time than me takes you up on your offer. I think this is a very interesting start.
I already received some emails... I hope we'll make a great font togheter! ;)
